statements: DELETE FROM CustomerSurveyData WHERE customer_id = 123 AND survey_id = 456;
DELETE FROM CustomerSurveyData WHERE survey_id = 101 AND customer_id = 1
DELETE FROM customer_survey_data WHERE customer_id = 101 AND satisfaction_score >= 4;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 205 OR (customer_id = 101 AND feedback_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00');
DELETE FROM sales_funnel WHERE customer_id = 'b08cfeb7-6634-4d06-82b2-8b2ccff3b2e2' AND funnel_stage = 'Qualified Lead';
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND survey_date < '2022-01-01';
